attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether to reinstate the Death Penalty for serious crimes.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is a democracy, and as such the people should have the choice on whether or not to bring back the death penalty.
attributes.background: We, the people of the UK should have the choice on whether or not the option of a death sentence should be available for terrorists, mass murderers, serial rapists, paedophiles, child killers, police killers, drug lords and people who commit treason and all other serious crimes.
